page.title: 19Customs and Events
page.content: Each year a village fete is held where a Rose Queen is crowned in a ceremony in the church.There are stalls, sideshows, sports and other events on the recreation ground as well as pet shows. A local silver band usually attends. In recent years an annual fell race and sheep roast have taken place to raise money towards the improvement of The Reading Room- a village hall used for various social functions. Meeting approx. twice in the winter months the local fox hunt assembles in the pub yard.They hunt with fox hounds and riders on horseback and haven't caught a fox for year. It is mainly a social event.
